meanings.definition: A race that combines swimming, cycling, and running.
meanings.sent1: She trained hard for the triathlons.
meanings.sent2: Many athletes compete in triathlons every year.
meanings.sent3: The fish, bike, and shoe decided to have their own triathlons.
meanings.sent4: His daily routine felt like a series of triathlons.
meanings.sent5: The excitement at the start line of the triathlons was palpable.

meanings.definition: An athletic event consisting of three different sports.
meanings.sent1: The triathlons were held in the nearby lake.
meanings.sent2: Participants in the triathlons showed great endurance.
meanings.sent3: The triathlons were so tough, even the trees were impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her busy day felt like juggling multiple triathlons at once.
meanings.sent5: The triathlons pushed her to her physical limits.
